bookSourceGroup: 🍿 日常,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '年度',
    '本月',
    '本周',
    '今日',
    '上升',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    'hot',
    'month',
    'week',
    'day',
    'ascension',
    'score',
    'fav'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/custom/${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','冒险','科幻','霸总','玄幻','校园','修真',
    '搞笑','穿越','后宫','耽美','恋爱','悬疑','恐怖','战争',
    '动作','同人','竞技','励志','架空','灵异','百合','古风',
    '生活','真人','都市','其他','日常','其它','纯爱','推理',
    '奇幻','格斗','大女主','剧情','总裁','武侠','异能','少年',
    '韩漫'
];
link = [
    '','/tags/6','/tags/7','/tags/8','/tags/9','/tags/10','/tags/11','/tags/12',
    '/tags/13','/tags/14','/tags/15','/tags/16','/tags/17','/tags/18','/tags/19','/tags/20',
    '/tags/21','/tags/22','/tags/23','/tags/24','/tags/25','/tags/26','/tags/27','/tags/28',
    '/tags/29','/tags/30','/tags/31','/tags/48','/tags/49','/tags/50','/tags/51','/tags/52',
    '/tags/53','/tags/54','/tags/55','/tags/56','/tags/57','/tags/58','/tags/59','/tags/60',
    '/tags/61'
];
Order = `{{get('order',Get('p'))}}`;
O = `{{Get('o')}}`;
Q = `{{Get('q')}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/category/list/${O}/finish/${Q}/order/${Order}${link[j]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(50, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  更　　新  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '周一',
    '周二',
    '周三',
    '周四',
    '周五',
    '周六',
    '周日'
];
orderby = [
    '1',
    '2',
    '3',
    '4',
    '5',
    '6',
    '7'
];
Gengxin = `{{get('gengxin',Get('ci0'))}}`;
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${Gengxin}/${orderby[i]}.html`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (rank.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (rank.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','长条','大女主','百合','耽美','纯爱','後宫','韩漫',
    '奇幻','轻小说','生活','悬疑','格斗','搞笑','伪娘','竞技',
    '职场','萌系','冒险','治愈','都市','霸总','神鬼','侦探',
    '爱情','古风','欢乐向','科幻','穿越','性转换','校园','美食',
    '剧情','热血','节操','励志','异世界','历史','战争','恐怖'
];
Shudan = `{{get('shudan',Get('ci0'))}}`;
Region = `{{get('region',Get('o'))}}`;
State = `{{get('state',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${Shudan}/${Region}/${kind[j]}/${State}/{{page}}.html`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID1 = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID1; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(30, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

bookSourceGroup: 🔭 其他,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '韩国',
    '连载',
    '完结',
    '日本',
    '连载',
    '完结'
];
tag = [
    '全部',
    '全部',
    '全部',
    '出版漫画',
    '出版漫画',
    '出版漫画'
];
end = [
    '-0',
    '0',
    '1',
    '-0',
    '0',
    '1'
];
for (i in title) {
    url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?tag=${tag[i]}&area=1&end=${end[i]}`;
    url2 = '&page={{page}}';
    url = url1 +url2;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:

var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

headers={

} else {

bookSourceGroup: 🍿 日常,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '人气',
    '更新',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    '&orderby=click',
    '&orderby=date',
    '&orderby=score',
    '&orderby=shoucang'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${orderby[i]}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','机战','运动','推理','冒险','搞笑','战争',
    '神魔','忍者','竞技','悬疑','社会','恋爱','宠物','吸血',
    '萝莉','后宫','御姐','霸总','玄幻','古风','历史','漫改',
    '游戏','穿越','恐怖','真人','科幻','都市','武侠','修真',
    '生活','动作'
];
link = [
    '','rexue','jizhan','yundong','tuili','maoxian','gaoxiao','zhanzhen',
    'shenmo','renzhe','jingji','xuanyi','shehui','lianai','chongwu','xixue',
    'luoli','hougong','yujie','bazong','xuanhuan','gufeng','lishi','mangai',
    'youxi','chuanyue','kongbu','zhenren','kehuan','dushi','wuxia','xiuzhen',
    'shenghuo','dongzuo'
];
OrderBy = `{{get('orderBy',Get('o'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${link[j]}${OrderBy}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(40, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
var Result = java.ajax(baseUrl + '/services/user.php?op=whoami');
let ck = cookie.getCookie(baseUrl);
if (!ck.includes('user=deleted') && ck.includes('user=')) {
    var list = JSON.parse(Result).value;
    var user = list.screenname;
    var fav = String(list.itemname);
    cache.put(Get('url') + "Fav_1", fav.replace(/@/, 'fav-'));
    cache.put(Get('url') + "Fav_2", fav.replace(/@/, '%40'));
    cache.put(Get('url') + "Account_1", user);
} else {
    cache.put(Get('url') + "Account_1",'');
}
Account = (cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") && String(cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")).length > 0) ? cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1") : '';
Url1 = `{{get('url1','0')}}`;
Url2 = `{{get('url2','0')}}`;
Url3 = `{{get('url3','0')}}`;
Url4 = `{{get('url4','0')}}`;
Url5 = `{{get('url5','0')}}`;
Cs = `{{get('cs','0')}}`;
Sort = `{{java.encodeURI(get('sort',Get('p')))}}`;
Sort_1 = `{{get('sort_1',Get('p'))}}`;
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    java.ajax(Get('url') + '/account/login');
    ck = cookie.getCookie(baseUrl);
    if (!ck.includes('user=deleted') && ck.includes('user=') && Account) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
        Result = java.ajax(baseUrl + '/services/user.php?op=whoami');
        list = JSON.parse(Result).value;
        user = list.screenname;
        cache.put(Get('url') + "Account_1", user);
    }
    if(String(cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")).length > 0) {
        Fav1 = cache.get(Get('url') + "Fav_1");
        Fav2 = cache.get(Get('url') + "Fav_2");
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的收藏', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${Fav1}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('M')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}${Fav1}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的合集', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}account_details&page_target=${Fav2}&page_elements=${Cs}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('MH')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}${Fav2}%2Fcollections?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
}
    MY = Get('my');
    for (i in MY) {
        let title = MY[i].split("::")[0];
        let link = MY[i].split("::")[1];
        let target = String(link).replace(/.*\//, '');
        exploreUrl.push(explore(title, `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${target}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('M')}}${Sort_1}${Url5}${link}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 1, false));
    }
}
exploreUrl.push(explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨书籍✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.push(explore('全部文本', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}texts${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('b')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}texts?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
exploreUrl.push(explore('全部书籍', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}books${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('b')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}books?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
TEXT = Get('text');
for (i in TEXT) {
    let title = TEXT[i].split("::")[0];
    let link = TEXT[i].split("::")[1];
    let target = String(link).replace(/.*\//, '');
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title, `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}${target}${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('b')}}${Sort_1}${Url5}${link}?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 1, false));
}
exploreUrl.push(explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨视频✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
    exploreUrl.push(explore('全部视频', `{{Get('url')}}${Url1}${Url2}movies${Url3}{{page}}&filter_map={{filter_map('v')}}${Sort_1}${Url4}movies?sort=${Sort}`, 1, 0.45, false));
VIDEO = Get('video');

if (User == true) {
    var list = JSON.parse(result).response.body ? (JSON.parse(result).response.body.hits ? JSON.parse(result).response.body.hits.hits : JSON.parse(result).response.body.page_elements.collections.hits.hits) : [];
    for (i in list) {
        name = list[i].fields.title;
        var collections = [];

        for (var j in collectionElements) {
            collections.push(String(collectionElements[j]));
        }
        collection = collections.join(',');
        if (list[i].fields.mediatype.includes('collection')) {
            author = '【默认合集】';
            if (collection.includes('texts')) {
                author = '【书籍合集】';
            } else if (collection.includes('movies')) {
                author = '【视频合集】';
            } else if (collection.includes('audio') || collection.includes('etree')) {
                author = '【音频合集】';
            } else if (collection.includes('image')) {
                author = '【图像合集】';
            } else {
                author = '【我的合集】';
            }
            kind = shortenNumber(list[i].fields.item_count || 0) + ' items' + ',' + formatBytes(list[i].fields.collection_size || 0) + ',collection' + ',' + collection;
            latest = '';
        } else {
            author = String(list[i].fields.creator).replace(/\,\s/g, '/').replace(/\,/g, '/').replace(/undefined/g, '');
            kind = String('✦ ' + shortenNumber(list[i].fields.downloads || 0) + ',' + '♥ ' + shortenNumber(list[i].fields.num_favorites || 0) + ',' + String(list[i].fields.mediatype).replace(/etree/, 'music') + ',' + list[i].fields.language + ',' + list[i].fields.year).replace(/undefined/g, '').replace(/✦\s\,/, '✦ 0,').replace(/♥\s\,/, '♥ 0,');
            latest = 'Addeddate: ' + String(list[i].fields.addeddate).replace(/T/, ' ').replace(/Z/, '');
        }
        intro = String(list[i].fields.description).replace(/undefined/g, '');
        cover = decodeURIComponent(Get('url') + '/services/img/' + list[i].fields.identifier);
        url = decodeURIComponent(Get('url') + '/details/' + list[i].fields.identifier);
        cache.put('Type' + url, list[i].fields.mediatype);
        cache.put('Identifier' + url, list[i].fields.identifier);
        cache.put('Name' + url, name);
        cache.put('Author' + url, author);
        cache.put('Kind' + url, kind);
        cache.put('Cover' + url, cover);
        cache.put('Intro' + url, intro);
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': latest,
            'intro': intro,
            'cover': cover,
            'url': url
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/&page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return '&page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var nextlist = JSON.parse(next).response.body ? (JSON.parse(next).response.body.hits ? JSON.parse(next).response.body.hits.hits : JSON.parse(next).response.body.page_elements.collections.hits.hits) : [];
    if (!list[0] || !nextlist[0]) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    var search = Get('s') == 0 ? '?' : '?service_backend=fts&';
    var sort = Get('r') == 0 ? '' : java.encodeURI(get('sort',Get('p')));
    var sort_1 = Get('r') == 0 ? '' : get('sort_1',Get('p'));
    var client_url = 'https://archive.org/search?query=' + e + sort;
    java.put(Get('url') + "searchkey", e);
    return Get('url') + '/services/search/beta/page_production/' + search + 'user_query=' + java.encodeURI(e) + '&hits_per_page=100&page={{page}}&filter_map=' + filter_map('s') + sort_1 + '&aggregations=false&client_url=' + java.encodeURI(client_url);
}(key));

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '总榜',
    '月榜',
    '周榜',
    '日榜',
    '最近更新',
    '新书发布',
    '推荐漫画'
];
orderby = [
    '/ranking/all',
    '/ranking/monthly',
    '/ranking/weekly',
    '/ranking/daily',
    '/update',
    '/update/newbook',
    '/update/recommend'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '正妹','恋爱','出版','肉欲','浪漫','大尺度','巨乳',
    '有夫之妇','女大生','狗血剧','同居','好友','调教','动作','后宫',
    '不伦','3D','校园','耽美','日漫'
];
link = [
    '正妹','恋爱','出版漫画','肉慾','浪漫','大尺度','巨乳',
    '有夫之婦','女大生','狗血劇','同居','好友','調教','动作','後宮',
    '不倫','3D','校園','耽美','日漫'
];
Ob = `{{get('ob',Get('p'))}}`;
St = `{{get('st',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/comics/${link[j]}/ob/${Ob}/st/${St}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

    'luoli','hougong','yujie','bazong','xuanhuan','gufeng','lishi','mangai',
    'youxi','chuanyue','kongbu','zhenren','kehuan','dushi','wuxia','xiuzhen',
    'shenghuo','dongzuo'
];

for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${link[j]}${OrderBy}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}

var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '排行榜',
    '连载中',
    '已完结'
];
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
url = [
    '`${host}/top.html`',
    '`${host}/weekly/?page={{page}}`',
    '`${host}/complete/?page={{page}}`'
];
for (i in title) {
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], eval(url[i]), 1, -1, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','神幻','女主','韩漫','百合','修真','恐怖','耽美',
    '穿越','悬疑','真人','古风','科幻','热血','霸总','恋爱',
    '生活','后宫','搞笑','校园'
];
link = [
    '全部','神幻','女主','韩漫','百合','修真','恐怖','耽美',
    '穿越','悬疑','真人','古风','科幻','热血','霸总','恋爱',
    '生活','后宫','搞笑','校园'
];
Area = `{{get('area',Get('o'))}}`;
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?cate=${link[j]}&area=${Area}&end=${End}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

                'author': String(list[i].select('.manga-category')[1].text()).replace(/[+·，\|\\]/g, '/').replace(/\/x\//g, '/').replace(/\,/g, '/').replace(/:\//g, ':').replace(/\/+/g, '/').replace(/（/g, '(').replace(/）/g, ')').replace(/\s\//g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/').replace(/\.\//g, '.'),
                'kind': String(list[i].select('.manga-category')[0].text()).replace(/\|/g, ',').replace(/\s/g, ',').replace(/、/g, ','),
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].select('.manga-rank-cover mip-img').attr('src') + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),
                'url': list[i].select('a').attr('href')
            });
        }
        Data();
    } else {
        var list =  JSON.parse(result).data.items;
        for (i in list) {
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': list[i].last_chapter,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].cover.replace(/\\/g, ''),
                'url': Get('url') + '/manga/' + list[i].manga_code
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/pn=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'pn=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',{"headers":{"Referer":"' + Get('url') + '/latest"},"method":"GET"}');
        if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.items[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '总榜',
    '月榜',
    '周榜',
    '日榜',
    '推荐',
    '最新',
    '热门'
];
orderby = [
    'ranks?date_type=total&_update=true',
    'ranks?date_type=month&_update=true',
    'ranks?date_type=week&_update=true',
    'ranks?date_type=day&_update=true',
    'recs?pos=3200102',
    'comics?ordering=-datetime_updated',
    'comics?ordering=-popular'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/v3/${orderby[i]}&limit=24&offset={{24*(page-1)}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','爱情','欢乐向','冒险','奇幻','百合','校园','科幻',
    '东方','耽美','生活','格斗','轻小说','悬疑','神鬼','职场',
    'TL','萌系','治愈','长条','四格','节操','舰娘','竞技',
    '搞笑','伪娘','热血','励志','性转换','彩色','后宫','美食',
    '侦探','AA','音乐舞蹈','魔幻','战争','历史','异世界','惊悚',
    '机战','都市','穿越','恐怖','C100','重生','C99','C101',
    'C97','C96','生存','宅系','武侠','C98','C95','FATE',
    '转生','无修正','仙侠','LoveLive','其他'
];
theme = [
    '','&theme=aiqing','&theme=huanlexiang','&theme=maoxian','&theme=qihuan','&theme=baihe','&theme=xiaoyuan','&theme=kehuan',
    '&theme=dongfang','&theme=danmei','&theme=shenghuo','&theme=gedou','&theme=qingxiaoshuo','&theme=xuanyi','&theme=shengui','&theme=zhichang',
    '&theme=teenslove','&theme=mengxi','&theme=zhiyu','&theme=changtiao','&theme=sige','&theme=jiecao','&theme=jianniang','&theme=jingji',
    '&theme=gaoxiao','&theme=weiniang','&theme=rexue','&theme=lizhi','&theme=xingzhuanhuan','&theme=COLOR','&theme=hougong','&theme=meishi',
    '&theme=zhentan','&theme=aa','&theme=yinyuewudao','&theme=mohuan','&theme=zhanzheng','&theme=lishi','&theme=yishijie','&theme=jingsong',
    '&theme=jizhan','&theme=dushi','&theme=chuanyue','&theme=kongbu','&theme=comiket100','&theme=chongsheng','&theme=comiket99','&theme=comiket101',
    '&theme=comiket97','&theme=comiket96','&theme=shengcun','&theme=zhaixi','&theme=wuxia','&theme=comiket98','&theme=comiket95','&theme=fate',
    '&theme=zhuansheng','&theme=Uncensored','&theme=xianxia','&theme=loveLive','&theme=qita'
];
Ordering = `{{get('ordering',Get('p'))}}`;
Top = `{{get('top',Get('o'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/v3/comics${Ordering}${Top}${theme[j]}&limit=24&offset={{24*(page-1)}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(90, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '排行',
    '更新'
];
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
url = [
    '`${host}/api/rank/0-0-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/latest/{{page}}`'
];
for (i in title) {
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], eval(url[i]), 1, 0.4, false));
}
title1 = [
    '韩国','完结','连载','更新',
    '日本','完结','连载','更新'
];
url1 = [
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-0-2-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-2-2-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-1-2-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-0-2-1-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-0-3-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-2-3-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-1-3-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-0-3-1-{{page}}`'
];
for (i in title1) {
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title1[i], eval(url1[i]), 1, 0.2, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],

];

    'fuchou','gufeng','qihuan','nixi','yineng','zhaixiang','chuanyue','rexue',
    'chunai','xitong','zhongsheng','maoxian','lingyi','danvzhu','juqing','lianai',
    'xuanhuan','nvshen','kehuan','mohuan','tuili','lieqi','zhiyu','doushi',
    'yixing','qingchun','mori','xuanyi','xiuxian','zhandou'
];
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/manga-tag/${link[j]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '年度',
    '本月',
    '本周',
    '今日',
    '上升',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    'hot',
    'month',
    'week',
    'day',
    'ascension',
    'score',
    'fav'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/custom/${orderby[i]}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','冒险','科幻','霸总','玄幻','校园','修真',
    '搞笑','穿越','后宫','耽美','恋爱','悬疑','恐怖','战争',
    '动作','同人','竞技','励志','架空','灵异','百合','古风',
    '生活','真人','都市','其他','爱情','武侠','格斗','侦探',
    '推理','剧情','其它','总裁','奇幻','韩漫','纯爱','日常',
    '少年','大女主','异能'
];
link = [
    '','/tags/6','/tags/7','/tags/8','/tags/9','/tags/10','/tags/11','/tags/12',
    '/tags/13','/tags/14','/tags/15','/tags/16','/tags/17','/tags/18','/tags/19','/tags/20',
    '/tags/21','/tags/22','/tags/23','/tags/24','/tags/25','/tags/26','/tags/27','/tags/28',
    '/tags/29','/tags/30','/tags/31','/tags/48','/tags/49','/tags/50','/tags/51','/tags/52',
    '/tags/53','/tags/294','/tags/295','/tags/296','/tags/297','/tags/298','/tags/299','/tags/300',
    '/tags/301','/tags/302','/tags/303'
];
order = [
    'hits',
    'addtime'
];
Order = `{{get('order',Get('p'))}}`;
O = `{{Get('o')}}`;
Q = `{{Get('q')}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/index.php/category/list/${O}/finish/${Q}/order/${Order}${link[j]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": ""
};
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var requestBody = `{}`;
var option = {
    "method": "POST",
    "body": String(requestBody),
    "headers": ""
};
var Url1 = Get('url') + '/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ListRank?device=pc&platform=web,' + JSON.stringify(option);
var Url2 = Get('url') + '/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/AllLabel?device=pc&platform=web,' + JSON.stringify(option);
rank = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Url1)).data.list;
kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Url2)).data.styles;
var exploreUrl = [];
if(cookie.getCookie(baseUrl).includes('SESSDATA')) {
    var list = JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://api.bilibili.com/x/web-interface/nav')).data;
    if (list.uname) {
        cache.put(Get('url') + "Account_1", list.uname);
        java.put(Get('url') + "Account_1", list.uname);
    } else {
    	java.startBrowser('https://passport.bilibili.com/login', '登录');
        list = JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://api.bilibili.com/x/web-interface/nav')).data;
        cache.put(Get('url') + "Account_1", list.uname);
        java.put(Get('url') + "Account_1", list.uname);
    }
    if(String(cache.get(Get('url') + "Account_1")).length > 0) {
        Option9 = `{{get('option9','0')}}`;
        Option10 = `{{get('option10','0')}}`;
        Option11 = `{{get('option11','0')}}`;
        Option12 = `{{get('option12','0')}}`;
        Option13 = `{{get('option13','0')}}`;
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + list.uname + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore(sign() + '✔️', '', 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('已购漫画', `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/user.v1.User/GetAutoBuyComics?device=pc&platform=web,${Option9}{{page}}${Option10}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('阅读历史', `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/bookshelf.v1.Bookshelf/ListHistory?device=pc&platform=web,${Option9}{{page}}${Option10}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣  追　漫  ✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('追漫顺序', `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/bookshelf.v1.Bookshelf/ListFavorite?device=pc&platform=web,${Option9}{{page}}${Option11}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('更新时间', `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/bookshelf.v1.Bookshelf/ListFavorite?device=pc&platform=web,${Option9}{{page}}${Option12}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('完成等免', `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/bookshelf.v1.Bookshelf/ListFavorite?device=pc&platform=web,${Option9}{{page}}${Option13}`, 1, 0.25, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
Option = `{{get('option','0')}}`;
Option1 = `{{get('option1','0')}}`;
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/GetRankInfo?device=pc&platform=web,${Option}${rank[i].id}${Option1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i].name, url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
Option2 = `{{get('option2','0')}}`;
Option3 = `{{get('option3','0')}}`;
Option4 = `{{get('option4','0')}}`;
Option5 = `{{get('option5','0')}}`;
Option6 = `{{get('option6','0')}}`;
Option7 = `{{get('option7','0')}}`;
Option8 = `{{get('option8','0')}}`;
O = `{{get('o1',Get('o'))}}`;
P = `{{get('p1',Get('p'))}}`;
Q = `{{get('q1',Get('q'))}}`;
R = `{{get('r1',Get('r'))}}`;
url0 = `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ClassPage?device=pc&platform=web,${Option2}-1${Option3}${O}${Option4}${P}${Option5}${R}${Option6}{{page}}${Option7}${Q}${Option8}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('全部', url0, 1, 0.25, false));
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ClassPage?device=pc&platform=web,${Option2}${kind[j].id}${Option3}${O}${Option4}${P}${Option5}${R}${Option6}{{page}}${Option7}${Q}${Option8}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j].name, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = ((kind.length + 1) % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - ((kind.length + 1) % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(40, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
type = [
    '全部',
    '都市',
    '出版',
    '剧情',
    '恋爱',
    '动作',
    '校园',
    '恐怖',
    '耽美',
    '搞笑',
    '爱情',
    '生活'
];
tag = [
    '全部',
    '都市',
    '出版漫画',
    '剧情',
    '恋爱',
    '动作',
    '校园',
    '恐怖',
    '耽美',
    '搞笑',
    '爱情',
    '生活'
];
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
for (i in type) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?tag=${tag[i]}${End}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(type[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (type.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (type.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  分　　类  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '全部漫画',
    '最新上架'
];
orderby = [
    '/classify',
    '/list/new'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}${orderby[i]}?page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.45, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','恋爱','纯爱','古风','异能','悬疑','剧情','科幻',
    '奇幻','玄幻','穿越','冒险','推理','武侠','格斗','战争',
    '热血','搞笑','大女主','都市','总裁','后宫','日常','韩漫',
    '少年','其他'
];
type = [
    'type=all','type=lianai','type=chunai','type=gufeng','type=yineng','type=xuanyi','type=juqing','type=kehuan',
    'type=qihuan','type=xuanhuan','type=chuanyue','type=mouxian','type=tuili','type=wuxia','type=gedou','type=zhanzheng',
    'type=rexie','type=gaoxiao','type=danuzhu','type=dushi','type=zongcai','type=hougong','type=richang','type=hanman',
    'type=shaonian','type=qita'
];
Region = `{{get('region',Get('o'))}}`;
State = `{{get('state',Get('q'))}}`;
Filter = `{{get('filter',Get('p'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/classify?${type[j]}${Region}${State}${Filter}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(30, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

<js>

headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);

    date = String('〔' + String(java.getElements('.supporting-text em').text()).replace(/\(|\s.*/g, '').replace(/年|月/g, '-').replace(/日/g, '') + '〕').replace(/〔〕/g, '');
    for (i in list) {
        title = list[i].text();
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        title = String(title).replace(/(_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/(.*?[话話章回期])\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/\s\s/g, ' ');
        data.push({
            'title': i == list.length - 1 ? title + date : title,
            'link': Get('url') + list[i].select('a').attr('href')
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?cate=全部&area=-1&end=`;
url2 = '&page={{page}}';
title = [
    '全部',
    '完结'
];
for (i in title) {
    url = url1 + i + url2;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, -1, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

JSON.stringify(headers);

            'intro': $('.chapter'),
            'cover': String(list[i].select('.mh-cover').attr('style')).replace(/.*\((.*)\),.*/, '$1'),
            'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('a').attr('href')
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);

        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
    '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
    '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
    '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
    '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫',
    '最新','最旧','收藏','新漫'
];
type = [
    '&area=2&sort=-1',
    '&area=2&sort=0',
    '&area=2&sort=1',
    '&area=2&sort=2',
    '&area=3&sort=-1',
    '&area=3&sort=0',
    '&area=3&sort=1',
    '&area=3&sort=2',
    '&area=4&sort=-1',
    '&area=4&sort=0',
    '&area=4&sort=1',
    '&area=4&sort=2',
    '&area=5&sort=-1',
    '&area=5&sort=0',
    '&area=5&sort=1',
    '&area=5&sort=2',
    '&area=6&sort=-1',
    '&area=6&sort=0',
    '&area=6&sort=1',
    '&area=6&sort=2',
    '&area=1&sort=-1',
    '&area=1&sort=0',
    '&area=1&sort=1',
    '&area=1&sort=2'
];
gender = [
    '-1',
    '1',
    '0',
    '2'
];
end = [
    '&end=0',
    '&end=2',
    '&end=1'
];
Gender = `{{get('gender',Get('o'))}}`;
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
Host = `{{Get('p')}}`;
for (i in title) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?gender=${Gender}${End}${type[i]}&img_host=${Host}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
exploreUrl.splice(0, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨韩国✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.splice(5, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨日漫✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.splice(10, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨国漫✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.splice(15, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨台漫✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.splice(20, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨其他✨   　　 ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
exploreUrl.splice(25, 0, explore('  ༺ˇ»`ʚ  　　  ✨未分类✨ 　　   ɞ´«ˇ༻', '', 1, 1, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);

}(key));
